resources.string: WELCOME TO THE STOCK PURCHASES APP

To use this app you must enter in 25 stocks if they do not already exist in the application. The stocks must have an eight digit alphanumeric id (AB123456), a customer name, the name of the company whose shares the customer is purchasing, the purchase price, the number of shares purchased, the date the purchase was made, and the total worth of the stock. NO FIELD CAN BE EMPTY. STOCK PRICES AND TOTAL WORTH MUST BE POSITIVE VALUES.
